# Changelog

## 0.1.2 - 2014-03-23
- Support Angular.JS 1.3.x (in bower dependencies)

## 0.1.1 - 2014-03-21
- Add main script in package.json for use with browserify  ([#1](https://github.com/urish/angular-moment/pull/1), contributed by [paolodm](https://github.com/paolodm))

## 0.1.0 - 2014-03-04
- Initial release
